body_html: @WenmuZhou : As an aside, you might want to consider alternatives to BasicLSTMCell. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/performance/performance_guide.md#rnn-performance (the contents will come to www.tensorflow.org on the next release)
